::Spears::

"I think we should wait until the shuttle gets back with the supplies 
and parts.  Then get an attack underway.  We'll be down by two or 
three while they are gone and may need every available bot here to 
defend the ship."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker nods. "They'll make it, Brix looks like he knows what he's 
doing."
> 
> He turns to look at the Ark. "I think we should get back to 
repairs, or 
> organize that attack."
